comments.text:
Ocd is something everyone has some more than others its were u ur obessed 
with having things in a certain order or being a bit bit pedantic with the 
order or cleanliness of something it is also know to be obsessed with 
cleaning but is mainly where someone it a bit picky & pedantic on how 
things are lane out and or having certain routines u have to complete each 
day there are many types of OCD and its a very hard thing to explain hope 
this has helped you a little more to understand the meaning of OCD

Wow! My school has never been that stick !!!
We can wear anything to crop-tops to shorts and our hair doesn't even

comments.text:
I live in India. We have a school uniform, hair must be in two

polish allowed, and we can't wear hoops-Definitely no make up and we have 
11 subjects.

i can't stand my bed without it being made. And if my room is dirty

captions.text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
[ALARM]
-Good morning, everybody.

Today I thought I would do a
morning routine, because you

guys have been leaving
lots of comments for it,

and waited ever so
patiently for this video.

So as you can tell, it is
definitely morning time,

because I have my crazy bedhead
hair and my sleepy eyes.

So to start off my morning, I
just take my Colgate toothpaste
and I put it on my toothbrush.

And i brush those pearly whities
to take the morning breath
away.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

As you will see,
I have a tendency

in making funny faces in the
morning when I brush my teeth.
Just an old habit, but enjoy.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Next step, I just put
in my clear contacts,

because without these things,
I literally could not live.

I cannot see anything
without them.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Next I'll just use my Cetaphil
daily facial moisturizer.

And it just helps keep your skin
nice and healthy and smooth.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

So I always my
outfit out the night

before so that it's prepared
for the next morning.
So here is before.
And ba-bam!
There is after.

I'm just going to take
my Sweet Pea perfume

and spritz it in
the air, and shimmy

through like my good friend,
Mac Barbie O'Simmon does.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Since my hair is already
basically straight

this morning, I'm just
going to brush it out and do

a simple French
twist in the front.

If you want to see a
full tutorial on this,
go to Cute Girls Hairstyles.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

So to try not to be
stinky during the day,

I just take my Suave cherry
blossom deodorant to put it on.

Next up is my BB
cream foundation.

And then I take my
foundation stick

and I just put it on to
cover up all my blemishes.
Next up is just blush.

So you just want to put it on
your cheeks and your cheekbones
to make it look more natural.

And take your base
powder, and just

put it on to set
your foundation.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
So next up is mascara.

And if you want to learn
how to put on mascara,

I have a previous tutorial
called Mascara for Beginners.
So go check it out.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Next up, me being
a little bit OCD,

I have to make my
bed in the morning.
I know.

Teenagers aren't supposed
to make their beds,

but [SIGH] I'm
too neat and tidy.
[MUSIC PLAYING]

And I decided I would bring
in a friend to say, hello.

So there is my cute
little puppy dog, Brady.

And he is just going to take
a nap on my nice, comfy bed.
You're so cute.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
Next up is breakfast.

And I just poured my Oat
Blender cereal in a bowl.

And I've taken some
fresh raspberries
and fresh blackberries.

They were like, the biggest
blackberries I've ever seen.

And I put them in
my cereal bowl.
And just pour some milk on top.
And eat that cereal.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
Yum.
Yeah.

And my dad always
makes me a sack lunch

in the morning with a
funny nickname on top.
So thank you, Daddy.

After my morning
routine, I am finally

ready to go and start my
morning and go to school.

So that is my morning
routine video.
I hope you guys liked it.

Be sure to check us out on
Instagram at BrooklynandBailey.
And we'll see you next week.
Bye.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
-Hey, everyone.

I'm Bailey from Cute
Girls Hairstyles.

And today I'm going to show
you guys a DIY hairstyle called
the side ribbon loony braid.

I can't remember
what's it's called.

The side-- oh, I
said side again.
Why do I keep saying side?

The side ribbon
accent loony braid.

Called the ribbon
accent loony braid.
